title: Batman: Dead to Rights
description: TV writer Andrew Kreisberg and fan-favourite artist Scott McDaniel explore the impact that capturing and jailing super-criminals like The Joker has on the Gotham City Police Department and how far one officer goes off the deep end when faced with the new threats to his city. The ramifications of the "new kind of criminal" emerging in Gotham's early days is felt with deadly consequence.
author: Andrew Kreisberg
